page.title: 13THE WALSALL ARBORETUM
page.content:
The{Arboretum}is a most attractive feature only a short walk from the town centre. Along with the Extension it now covers around 80 acres of land.
Just inside the Front Lodge which is the main entrance, is the lake which is used for boating, fishing and other water sports. Other outdoor activities available include bowls, miniature golf and tennis.
Other items of interest are the aviary where a group of peacocks can be found and a steam railway.
Major attractions during the year are the{Walsall Show}held annually during the{August Bank Holiday,}and the {Walsall Illuminations}held over a four week period in{September. }
